caseTitle: Fazal Ellahi (decd.) thr. LRs v. Mst. Zainab Bi
authorJudge: MR. JUSTICE QAZI MUHAMMAD AMIN AHMED
tagline: With a suspect entry, entire transaction is structured upon a self-serving statement pointed upon the legitimate proprietary rights of a hapless female in a rural neighborhood. Mutation by itself does not create title unless demonstrated to be backed by a valid transaction. Fraud vitiates most solemn proceedings and thus period of limitation would not embargo a justiciable claim directed against fraud.
